meanings.definition: The quality or state of being freakish
meanings.sent1: Her freakishnesses were evident in her unusual clothing choices.
meanings.sent2: The circus clown's freakishnesses entertained the children.
meanings.sent3: The freakishnesses of the alien costume made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The freakishnesses of the haunted house created a spine-chilling atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The freakishnesses of the monster under the bed haunted his dreams.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions of a freakish nature
meanings.sent1: His freakishnesses included juggling knives while riding a unicycle.
meanings.sent2: The movie character's freakishnesses added suspense to the plot.
meanings.sent3: The freakishnesses of the dog wearing sunglasses amused the park visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her freakishnesses on the dance floor captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The freakishnesses of the ghostly figure sent shivers down their spines.

meanings.definition: An instance of something being freakish
meanings.sent1: The freakishnesses of the storm caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent2: Witnessing the freakishnesses of the magic show amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The freakishnesses of the giant pumpkin at the fair were unforgettable.
meanings.sent4: The freakishnesses of the abandoned house gave it an eerie vibe.
meanings.sent5: The freakishnesses of the rare flower attracted botanists from around the world.
